AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Thieves Guild ear
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While not exactly a member of the Thieves Guild, [PAWN_nameDef] did know someone who knew someone, and ensured that someone got plentiful information on potential hauls, all for a generous cut of course.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Thieves Guild fence
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: While [PAWN_nameDef] may have owned a reasonably well known trade house, [PAWN_pronoun] actually made most of [PAWN_possessive] money selling stolen items for the local Thieves Guild.

AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.title: Thieves Guild operative
AlienRace.AlienBackstoryDef.description: As an Operative of the Thieves Guild, [PAWN_nameDef] was often entering peoples houses unannounced, and very much unwanted. It took a quick mind to find the target, because dallying too long was never an option.
